Plot: Beautiful, detached, laconic, consumptive Lily Brest is a streetwalker with few clients. She loves her idle boyfriend Raoul who gambles away what little she earns. The town's power broker, ...
Title: Shadow of Angels
Writer: Rainer Werner Fassbinder (dialogue), Daniel Schmid (screenplay), Rainer Werner Fassbinder (screenplay)
Actors: Ingrid Caven, Rainer Werner Fassbinder, Annemarie Düringer, Adrian Hoven
